Infectra



*Infectra looks at the others firing at the base. She wasn't su=
re about this but knew if she didn't than Deemos wouldn't be happy. Infectr=
a starts firing her optics lasers at Predacon Base, moving around alot tryi=
ng to get as much damage as possible*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: THECODE 
  To: NBW 
  Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2000 4:35 AM
  Subject=
: Attack on the Predacon base...


  Deemos and his gang, now named the Cho=
sen Ones, tried to call out Psuedo in front of the Predacon base, but no sh=
ow. (Predacon base, NOT cave) Psuedo wanted to come out, but Blackarachnia =
ordered him to stand guard inside of the base.

  "That's it, if Psuedo won=
't come out, so we destroy the base, either way, he shall die!" Deemos said=
.
   
  "Destroy the base?" Artist asked.
   
  "It's okay, because it will=
 be for a good cause." Deemos said. Artist smiled, he should never have dou=
bted Deemos!
   
  Diskus flew in and fired 2 missiles at The Predacon base=
. Artist posed and fired 4 electrical blasts at the Predacon base. Doom Ice=
 threw a grenade at the Predacon base. Stronghold fires 4 optic blasts at t=
he Predacon base. Blender fires a rocket at the Predacon base. Airbomber fi=
res 25 machine gun shots at the Predacon base. Rizopas fires 4 shots at the=
 Predacon base. Deemos sits back and smiles while rubbing his hands togethe=
r...
